participant_1.background:

My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.
i am terrified of spiders , but love snakes.
i wonder about what life in space would be like.
I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes.

my parents would take my brother and i when we were little.
my glasses are always dirty and i cannot seem to get them clean.

I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid.

content.text: I love to hike. I find it to be a really relaxing way to get some exercise.
I love hiking too! I fell and sprained my ankle while hiking last year.
Oh no! That sounds painful. How long did it take to heal?
It took a few weeks, but I was able to go back hiking after that.
That's good to hear. I'm glad you were able to get back to it.
Me too. I love being outdoors.
Me too. I love being in nature.
My favorite outdoor activities are hiking, biking, and swimming.
Those are all great activities. I also like to go camping.
I've never been camping. I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. I'm always happy to give advice about outdoor activities.
I appreciate it. I'm going to look into camping. I have a feeling I'd like it.
